thread.title: 'Urban mining' in S.Korea pulls rare battery materials from recycled tech

title: 'Urban mining' in S.Korea pulls rare battery materials from recycled tech
text:
'Urban mining' in S.Korea pulls rare battery materials from recycled tech 11:29am BST - 01:41 
As China's aggressive hunt for overseas cobalt and lithium for electric vehicles pushes up prices and causes a global shortage of the key metals, South Korea is increasingly turning to such ''urban mining'' to recover cobalt, lithium and other scarce metals from electronic waste. Jim Drury reports.
